title: [Large-scale] Curriculum Design for Evolutionary Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design concepts and understanding of primary education settings
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing the acquisition of evolutionary learning community design skills for pre-/in-service elementary school teachers.

learning_goals: Learners identify three or more core elements of Evolutionary Learning Communities (ELC) using a systems thinking-based design framework
Learners complete projects by applying sustainable and developmental future-oriented learning environment design principles to real educational contexts
Learners create and execute ELC implementation roadmaps through collaborative design processes with peer teachers

resources: Smartphone-based collaboration tools (KakaoTalk, Google Drive, etc.)
Offline workshop space and instructional materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
